QuestData.Title: The Twilight Skymaster
QuestData.Description: Twilight Skymaster Richtofen is at the Twilight Aerie up above and to the southeast. No matter what we do down here, if he's not dealt with, all hope is lost for Highperch.$B$BWhile Heartrazor is too injured to help you with the fight, he can fly you up there. The rest is up to you, $n.$B$BGood luck.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Shoot him out of the skies!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get a flight from Heartrazor to the Twilight Aerie and deal with Twilight Skymaster Richtofen.
QuestData.RewardText: The pridelings did what? They must love you deeply for freeing them.$B$BThank you, $n. You've saved Highperch!
